messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 470
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hello?!  Camp Fire.  ;) Been around since 1910...first group to go co-ed, in the 70s.  Totally diverse.  Just came out with a new program called Community
messages.messageBody:
>
>
>
>Oh If ONLY! I hate that scouts is seperated into
>different sex groups. I wish there was an all family
>inclusive, non-authoritarian, non-military,
>non-religious (or multifaith embracing) group like
>that. The legal implications alone of trying to
>create a scouting alternative is so daunting, not to
>mention the financial aspects.
>

Hello?! Camp Fire. ;)

Been around since 1910...first group to go co-ed, in the '70s. Totally
diverse. Just came out with a new program called Community Family
Clubs, (but our club has always included all ages and up to adults).

www.campfireusa.org and our club's website www.geocities.com/campfirememphis

Tuck
